column1: 43 year old man, in the absence of known medical history. For 7 days fever and asthenia Blood count, polymerase chain reaction and procalciton in the norm.
Extended and nuanced parenchymal thickening in the middle-lower right field.

The LID shows an extensive thickening of frosted glass superimposed on thickening of the inter- and intralobular interstices with consolidative areas in its context. Small areas with frosted glass at the LSS.
The contextual pharyngeal swab for COVID-19 was positive.
